title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251, subpt. 251-4 - Inmate's Assistant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251, subpt. 251-4 - Inmate's Assistant

State Regulations
§ 251-4.1 - Employee Assistance
§ 251-4.2 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 251, subpt. 251-4

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 138

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
